topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54358e7d6368726c0e4f0100#post_54358e7d6368726c0e4f0100
Deep time here.



Memories. Each and every physical copy holds a memory dear to my heart from the past that an emulator couldn't hold.

These copies grow up with you as you get older and still hold the past within them from fun events. Every time you open a box it's like a puff of fresh air from the times you and your friends and family played together. Thes physical copies are like friends as you will.

Friends that have been with you for a long time, and when you get to play them it's like meeting up with an old friend to me I guess.

Basically, sentimental value.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5
